public class HtmlRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
Signals that an error condition has occured.

HtmlRuntimeException()
Constructs an HtmlExcpetion with no detail error message.
HtmlRuntimeException(String)
Constructs an HtmlRuntimeException with the specified error message.

HtmlRuntimeException 
  public HtmlRuntimeException()
Constructs an HtmlExcpetion with no detail error message.
HtmlRuntimeException 
  public HtmlRuntimeException(String s)
Constructs an HtmlRuntimeException with the specified error message.
